snippet: American scientists are wondering what role, if any, they will play in the future in high-energy physics — the search for the fundamental particles and forces of nature — a field they once dominated.
lead_paragraph: American scientists are wondering what role, if any, they will play in the future in high-energy physics — the search for the fundamental particles and forces of nature — a field they once dominated.

headline.main: Particle Physicists in U.S. Worry About Being Left Behind
headline.print_headline: Particle Physicists in U.S. Worry About Being Left Behind
